Installation
============

.. include:: common.rst


Download Options
----------------

Download the latest version from http://galpak3d.univ-lyon1.fr/downloads.html.

Clone the repository using git (up coming)

Download from the Astro Common Library (up coming)

If you want to contribute, write to `Nicolas Bouch√© <mailto:nicolas.bouche@univ-lyon1.fr>`_.


Setup
-----
Either

* Run ``pip install .``

or

* Add the galpak parent directory to your PYTHONPATH.
